results.name: Primorial inflation of A052126(n), where A052126(n) = n/(largest prime dividing n).
comment: The primorial inflation of n, A108951(n), divided by its largest squarefree divisor, which is also its largest primorial divisor.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
